title: Serial Killers Tres Tria
description: After the success of Serial Killers Iterum, JWKfiction is proud to announce a third installment in the horrific Serial Killers series of anthologies. New and established authors and artists offer this deep dive into the twisted mirrors of our own minds, exposing subconscious desires and asking us if we, ourselves, may be as monstrous as the people we like to read about...
author: James Ward Kirk
